OB: The OK button is enabled even when no selection is made.
SR:
MA (09.08.2001 12:04:06)
1. Go to the preference page and select 'WorkbenchFile Editors'.
2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' section, switch to 'External Editors' and select an entry.
3. Switch back to the 'Internal Editors' (without making a selection).
4. Press OK.

Expected Result: The selected external editor is added without any changes to the 'Internal Editors' section.
